pkgmetadata.longdescription: # falliblefallible, an experimental ansible## building```shell$ python3 src/fallible/_vendor/_build.py --pr 72553 devel$ python3 -m build -w -o dist$ python3 -m build -w -o dist compat_entrypoints```Alternatively, instead of using `--pr` to enumerate individual PRs, you can use `--all` to fetch all PRs labeled with `fallible`.## using```shell$ python3 -m fallible playbook site.yml$ fallible-playbook site.yml```## ansible-core compatThe `compat_entrypoints` dir provides a package for `fallible-compat` that will install `ansible*` entrypoints.```shell$ pip3 install fallible-compat$ ansible-playbook site.yml```
